required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Effects of Ezetimibe (MK-0653) on the Postprandial (Following a Meal) Lipoprotein Response in Participants With Primary Hypercholesterolemia (High Cholesterol) (MK-0653-072)(COMPLETED)
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, 2-Period, Crossover Study to Evaluate the Effects of Ezetimibe on the Postprandial Lipoprotein Response in Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia

brief_summary.textblock: A study to evaluate the cholesterol-lowering effects of ezetimibe in participants with primary hypercholesterolemia (high cholesterol) after eating a meal that is high in cholesterol. The primary hypothesis is that treatment with ezetimibe 10 mg/day reduces the cholesterol concentration of the chylomicron-containing Sf≥400 fraction following a cholesterol-enriched test meal.

primary_outcome.measure: Total Cholesterol Concentration of Chylomicron (Sf≥400) Fractions After a Cholesterol-Rich Test Meal
primary_outcome.time_frame: Immediately prior to consumption of the test meal (baseline) and at 2, 3, 4, and 6 hours after test meal on Day 28 of each treatment period.
primary_outcome.description: On each of 2 days prior to the last day of each treatment period, participants consumed 2 large eggs in the evening. On the morning of the final day of each treatment period, fasting participants were given a site-prepared, cholesterol-enriched milkshake that provided 1114 calories of total energy (~44% of calories from fat, ~40% of calories from carbohydrate and ~17% of calories from protein) and 504 mg of cholesterol. The milkshake was consumed over a 15-minute period. Plasma samples were collected immediately prior to consumption of the test meal (baseline) and at 2, 3, 4, and 6 hours afterwards for isolation and analysis of lipoprotein fractions. The geometric mean concentration level was calculated using data obtained at all timepoints.

secondary_outcome.measure: Total Cholesterol Concentration of Chylomicron-remnant (Sf 60-400) Subfractions After a Cholesterol-Rich Test Meal
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Immediately prior to consumption of the test meal (baseline) and at 2, 3, 4, and 6 hours after test meal on Day 28 of each treatment period.
secondary_outcome.description: On each of 2 days prior to the last day of each treatment period, participants consumed 2 large eggs in the evening. On the morning of the final day of each treatment period, fasting participants were given a site-prepared, cholesterol-enriched milkshake that provided 1114 calories of total energy (~44% of calories from fat, ~40% of calories from carbohydrate and ~17% of calories from protein) and 504 mg of cholesterol. The milkshake was consumed over a 15-minute period. Plasma samples were collected immediately prior to consumption of the test meal (baseline) and at 2, 3, 4, and 6 hours afterwards for isolation and analysis of lipoprotein subfractions. The geometric mean concentration level was calculated using data obtained at all timepoints.

arm_group.description: After a 2-week single- blind placebo run-in, participants will receive ezetimibe 10 mg once daily for 4 weeks and then receive placebo once daily for 4 weeks.
After a 2-week single- blind placebo run-in, participants will receive placebo once daily for 4 weeks and then receive ezetimibe10 mg once daily for 4 weeks.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Eligible patients will be otherwise healthy men and women (if not on oral contraceptives or hormone replacement therapy) 18 through 70 years of age with moderately high cholesterol.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Individuals on other lipid-lowering therapy (medicines that lower cholesterol) including statins (within 6 weeks) and fibrates (within 8 weeks) prior to administration of the study drug.

group.title: Ezetimibe→Placebo
group.description: After a 2-week single- blind placebo run-in, participants will receive ezetimibe 10 mg once daily for 4 weeks and then receive placebo once daily for 4 weeks.

group.title: Placebo→ Ezetimibe
group.description: After a 2-week single- blind placebo run-in, participants will receive placebo once daily for 4 weeks and then receive ezetimibe10 mg once daily for 4 weeks.

group.title: Ezetimibe→Placebo
group.description: After a 2-week single- blind placebo run-in, participants will receive ezetimibe 10 mg once daily for 4 weeks and then receive placebo once daily for 4 weeks.

group.title: Placebo→ Ezetimibe
group.description: After a 2-week single- blind placebo run-in, participants will receive placebo once daily for 4 weeks and then receive ezetimibe10 mg once daily for 4 weeks.

outcome.title: Total Cholesterol Concentration of Chylomicron (Sf≥400) Fractions After a Cholesterol-Rich Test Meal
outcome.description: On each of 2 days prior to the last day of each treatment period, participants consumed 2 large eggs in the evening. On the morning of the final day of each treatment period, fasting participants were given a site-prepared, cholesterol-enriched milkshake that provided 1114 calories of total energy (~44% of calories from fat, ~40% of calories from carbohydrate and ~17% of calories from protein) and 504 mg of cholesterol. The milkshake was consumed over a 15-minute period. Plasma samples were collected immediately prior to consumption of the test meal (baseline) and at 2, 3, 4, and 6 hours afterwards for isolation and analysis of lipoprotein fractions. The geometric mean concentration level was calculated using data obtained at all timepoints.
outcome.time_frame: Immediately prior to consumption of the test meal (baseline) and at 2, 3, 4, and 6 hours after test meal on Day 28 of each treatment period.
outcome.population: Participants who received at least one dose of study drug and did not have any protocol violations.

group.title: Ezetimibe
group.description: Participants who received ezetimibe 10 mg in active treatment period regardless of randomly assigned sequence

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Participants who received placebo in active treatment period regardless of randomly assigned sequence

measure.title: Total Cholesterol Concentration of Chylomicron (Sf≥400) Fractions After a Cholesterol-Rich Test Meal

measure.population: Participants who received at least one dose of study drug and did not have any protocol violations.

analysis.p_value_desc: Data were back-transformed from the log scale and adjusted for treatment

reported_events.desc: All participants who received at least 1 dose of study drug. Adverse events are reported by study drug received at the time of the event and not by treatment sequence.

group.title: Ezetimibe
group.description: Participants received 10 mg ezetimibe once daily for 4 weeks

group.title: Placebo
group.description: Participants received placebo once daily for 4 weeks

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: The Sponsor must have the opportunity to review all proposed abstracts, manuscripts, or presentations regarding this study 60 days prior to submission for publication/presentation. Any information identified by the Sponsor as confidential must be deleted prior to submission. Sponsor review can be expedited to meet publication guidelines.

point_of_contact.name_or_title: Senior Vice President, Global Clinical Development
